tuv.seg: Even if you do not plan on becoming a technical communicator (a person whose main job is to produce documents such as manuals, reports, and websites), you will often find yourself writing documents on your own, participating in teams that write them, and contributing technical information for others who read and write them.
即使你不打算成为技术传播者（主要工作是制作手册、报告和网站等文件的人），你也会经常发现你自己在写文件，参加写文件的团队，并为其他阅读和写文件的人贡献技术信息。
THIS TEXTBOOK EXPLORES how people in the working world find, create, and deliver technical information.
这本教材旨在指导相关从业者创造、发现和传播技术信息。
The purpose of Technical Communication is to help you learn the skills you need to communicate more effectively and more efficiently in your professional life.
技术传播的目的是帮助你学习你所需要的技能，以便在你的职业生活中更有效、更高效地交流。
